events.name: Sober Faction Memorial Ritual
events.description: Co-Director Priest Joe Dee & Reverend Jon Eldritch with Sober Faction's Council will kick off the event with a memorial ritual for all those lost to overdose.

events.name: Naloxone Training
events.description: Minister Kal Set & Director of Sober Faction Outreach, Keleigh Rose, will host a Naloxone Training.

events.name: Open Share Sober Faction Meeting
events.description: An open share Sober Faction meeting will take place for all to remember loved ones.

events.name: Musical Performance
events.description: The event will close with musical entertainment to inspire action & change.

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy with DJ Mercy Maelica
events.description: Join Mercy, our veteran performer and Resident DJ for music and videos live from Salem.

events.name: Satanic Panic Archive Library
events.description: The Grey Faction archives of academic and other materials
